title: Schema for image analysis of sintered tungsten samples

Stress.description: Stress values calculated from load data, units are MPa

Strain.description: Strain values obtained from DIC machine, unitless

Particle area.description: Particle area obtained from image analysis values in um squared, represented in histogram

Intergranular phase area.description: Intergranular phase area from image analysis, units in um squared, again represented in a histogram
